bug.author: alquraishi
bug.summary: Docs for tf.device should point to tf.Graph.device
bug.description:
Currently the docs for tf.device located here: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/framework.html#device>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/framework.html#device</denchmark-link>
point to tf.Graph.name_scope() for more details, when it would be a lot more helpful if they pointed instead to tf.Graph.device(), i.e. here: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/framework.html#Graph.device>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/framework.html#Graph.device</denchmark-link>
This would be more consistent with the rest of the docs as well.

comments.comment: Should be fixed at HEAD now.
